entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
